Description: Intaglio; light green steatite; oval; double bevelled edge. Side A: Schematic representation of a herm-like figure, representation of Crucifixion. Inscription scattered in the free field. Side B: Illegible inscription, perhaps a mixture of Coptic and Greek (Michel).
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (460)
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (818) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/818)
